code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useMutation}from'@apollo/client';import{SAVE_COMPTE}from'../graphql/mutations';import{GET_ALL_COMPTES}from'../graphql/queries';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddCompte(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({solde:'',dateCreation:'',type:'COURANT'});const[saveCompte]=useMutation(SAVE_COMPTE,{refetchQueries:[{query:GET_ALL_COMPTES}]});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await saveCompte({variables:{compte:formData}});alert('Compte ajouté avec succès !');setFormData({solde:'',dateCreation:'',type:'COURANT'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{marginBottom:'20px',display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',gap:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Solde",value:formData.solde,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,solde:parseFloat(e.target.value)}),required:true,style:{padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',borderRadius:'5px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:formData.dateCreation,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,dateCreation:e.target.value}),required:true,style:{padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',borderRadius:'5px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:formData.type,onChange:e=>setFormData({...formData,type:e.target.value}),style:{padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',borderRadius:'5px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"COURANT",children:"Courant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"EPARGNE",children:"\xC9pargne"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:{backgroundColor:'#00bfff',color:'white',padding:'8px 15px',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Ajouter"})]});}export default AddCompte;
